tool_description: The world’s most popular API for getting coverage of stock data, breaking news and current headlines from the US and around the world which helps you to create Application like The Wall Street Journal.
name: Wall Street Journal
title: Wall Street Journal

api_list.name: api/v1/checkServer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wall-street-journal.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/checkServer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wall-street-journal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
